entries.journal_entry_description: Harwakokok doesn't completely trust you yet. You need to prove yourself worthy in the tranditional Wookiee manner in order for him to believe that you are telling them the truth. In order to accomplish this, he has told you to travel to the bottom of the Rryatt Trail and kill an extremely dangerous minstygnar, Scratch. Harwakokok told you that Scratch can be found at the bottom of the Rryatt Trail.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: In order to prove yourself worthy to Harwakokok, you must travel to the lowest level of the Rryatt Trail, kill, and collect the head of Scratch. Scratch is an ancient and powerful minstyngar.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Now that you have proven yourself to be a mighty warrior by slaying Scratch, return to Harwakokok and convince him to attack the platform.
